text: Ra hamile khana–e–ka'aba–la'i manisaharuka punya ra santiko tha'um banayaum, tapa'ile ibrahima ubheko sthanala'i namaja padhne tha'um bana'unu. Ra hamile ibrahima tatha isma'ilabata vaca liyaum ki timiharu mero ghara (ka'aba)la'i parikrama garne, ra ruka'a ra sajada (dhoga) garneharuko nimti sapha ra pavitra rakhne gara
